plot: For 10-year-old Samantha Wallace, sexy can't come soon enough. This film explores the themes of parental expectations and childhood fascination with an over-exposed culture of sexuality.
title: Big Little Girl
plot_es: For 10-year-old Samantha Wallace, sexy can't come soon enough. This film explores the themes of parental expectations and childhood fascination with an over-exposed culture of sexuality.
